aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.description: Photography is not just my job, it's my way of seeing the world. With over 5 years of experience, I am dedicated to capturing the authentic beauty and sincere emotions of my subjects.

1.text: The photos are wonderful! You managed to capture every emotion of our wedding.
1.author: Giulia and Marco

2.text: Professional, discreet, and creative. The best photographer we could have chosen.
2.author: Alessandro B.

3.text: A fun and relaxed experience, and the result was beyond expectations.
3.author: Laura P.

meta.title: About Me | Photographer [Name Surname]
meta.description: Learn more about my journey, my philosophy, and my experience in the world of photography.

AboutPage.title: Hi, my name is [Name]
AboutPage.intro: I am a professional photographer with over 5 years of experience. My passion is to capture sincere emotions and important moments of your life.
AboutPage.description: Specializing in weddings and portraits. My style combines classic elegance with the vibrancy of reportage.

1.q: How can I book a session?
1.a: You can write to me via the contact form or on WhatsApp. I will reply within 24 hours to discuss the details and confirm the date.

2.q: How long will it take to receive the photos?
2.a: For portraits, delivery is in 1-2 weeks. For weddings, within 3-4 weeks. You will receive a link to a private gallery.

3.q: Do you also work outside the city?
3.a: Yes, I am available for travel throughout Italy and abroad. Travel costs will be agreed upon based on the distance.
